FYI; The next apiclient version doesn't provide a serializer anymore, and if it did it would not use GSON but kotlinx.serialization. I'd recommend switching to kotlinx.serialization in this PR for all new JSON stuff.
Optionally; it also supports CBOR which might have slightly better performance.
